entry.title: Blog post in PLOS Biologue
entry.content: Our recent paper in PLOS Biology has been featured in the “Behind the Paper” series on PLOS Biologue. The story delves into the process of pursuing multiple hypotheses and features neon-colored images. You can read the article here.
entry.summary: Our recent paper in PLOS Biology has been featured in the “Behind the Paper” series on PLOS Biologue. The story delves into the process of pursuing multiple hypotheses and features neon-colored images. You can read the article here.

entry.title: Welcome, Jordan!
entry.content: A biochemistry honors student, Jordan Perez, has joined us to work on her project. She will study how health depends on phosphoglycerate dehydrogenase function. Have fun Jordan!
entry.summary: A biochemistry honors student, Jordan Perez, has joined us to work on her project. She will study how health depends on phosphoglycerate dehydrogenase function. Have fun Jordan!
